pages.author: Matthsws
pages.letter_body: Dear Mr. Long, My mother-in-law Charlene Cellier, received your letter recently urging her to write to Senators Packwood and Hatfield in opposition to added cigarette taxes. Charlene will be unable to follow through on this. She is in Intensive Care and terminally ill with lung cancer, the direct result of use of your products. Just thought you might want to know.
